status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9dgpl","text":"To purify MBP-NAP1, gene-synthesize human NAP1 cDNA (by Genscript) and subclone into a pGEX-4T1 vector with an N-terminal MBP-tag. Follow it by a TEV cleavage site before wild-type NAP1 (RRID:Addgene_208871), NAP1 delta-NDP52 (S37K/A44E) (RRID:Addgene_208872), or NAP1 delta-TBK1 (L226Q/L233Q) (RRID:Addgene_208873).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1nddk","text":"For expression of MBP-TEV-NAP1 in E. coli, transfer the pGEX-4T1 vector encoding MBP-TEV-NAP1 into E. coli Rosetta pLySS cells. Grow the cells in 2xTY medium at   until an OD600 of 0.4 and then continue at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":34,"length":7},{"style":"italic","offset":99,"length":7},{"style":"sub","offset":174,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":161,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":206,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"18","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a9brr","text":"Once the cells reached an OD600 of 0.8, induce protein expression with   IPTG for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":28,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":71,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":82,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":87,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"50","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":57600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"18","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"drg0c","text":"Sonicate cell lysates and then clear by centrifugation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3epkg","text":"Then, centrifugation at   in a SORVAL RC6+ centrifuge with an F21S-8x50Y rotor (Thermo Scientific).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"18000","duration":2700,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1qdlq","text":"Collect and incubate the supernatant with pre-equilibrated Amylose beads (Biolabs) for   at   with gentle shaking to bind MBP-TEV-NAP1.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":87,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":92,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"72vve","text":"Centrifuge the samples to pellet the beads and remove the unbound lysate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b5jeh","text":"Wash the beads twice with wash buffer, once with high salt wash buffer, and two more times with wash buffer. {"blocks":[{"key":"6rqgh","text":"After the proteins are released from the beads, filter the MBP-TEV-NAP1 protein through a   syringe filter, concentrate using a 30 kDa cut-off Amicon filter (Merck Millipore), and load onto a pre-equilibrated Superose 6 Increase 10/300 GL column (Cytiva). {"blocks":[{"key":"4ehch","text":"After concentrating the purified protein, aliquot the protein and snap-freeze in liquid nitrogen.
